document_data.name: Matruda al-Muhif
document_data.mainbody: '''Matruda al-Muhif''' was a [[holy slayer]] and member of the [[Flamedeath Fellowship]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|26}}
document_data.History: Matruda separated herself from the other members of the Fellowship, gaining well-earned infamy throughout the Land of Fate.
document_data.Relationships: Matruda was a close ally of [[Kerima al-Zahir]] of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|31}}
document_data.Skills: In addition to her martial prowess, Matruda was a master of disguise.
